Key Match Events: Tyrese Haliburton recorded a double-double with 25 points and 10 assists
Pascal Siakam scored consecutive dunks off a Schroder turnover and after Schroder got stuffed at the rim
Indiana locked in defensively in the fourth quarter to separate from the Warriors
Pre-Game Insights: Golden State started Dennis Schroder, Lindy Waters III, Buddy Hield, Kyle Anderson, and Trayce Jackson-Davis due to injuries
Andrew Wiggins is home for personal reasons
Jonathan Kuminga is out for at least two more weeks
Brandin Podziemski is dealing with an abdominal strain
Gary Payton II is recovering from a calf strain
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors had a lot of hustle points but not many scoreboard points
The team had a seven-minute stretch with just two points, allowing Indiana to stretch its lead to 14
Golden State chipped away in the last three minutes to enter halftime down five
The Warriors had a quick burst in the fourth quarter but couldn't overcome the talent disparity
Miscellaneous Highlights: Spencer logged 11 points, three steals, and three assists in 23 minutes
Santos provided a lift off the bench with a back-tap steal and smart cuts off the ball
The Warriors had a quick burst in the fourth quarter but couldn't overcome the talent disparity
